Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory110.png'}
{3: "Ayla informs Gray Raven the gravity room's mechanism. At that moment..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Target sighted. Recycling now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ayla notices the extremely high corruption level of the tall enemy, and realizes what was happening.'}
{3: 'But just when she starts to attack, Selena is already ripped off the terminal—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: "The enemy then turns around and takes Ayla's strike with his broad shoulders."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ayla does not hesitate for one second. She unleashes numerous attacks with her scythe.'}
{3: 'Strangely, the enemy does not want to engage in the fight. Instead, he keeps moving back.'}
{3: "Once he reaches the cabin door, he leaps toward the gravity room's core area..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory112.png'}
{3: 'After bumping into Gray Raven in the gravity room, Ayla follows Gabriel to a shattered floating platform—'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Gabriel flips over and fires a shot. He uses the counterforce to jump through the opening on the wall, which is a result of the previous blast.'}
{3: 'After the heat from the explosion dissipates...'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Before he gets away, I must...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just when Ayla is about to follow him, a mechanic claw protrudes from the edge of the platform.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The claw continues to climb toward the platform surface, finally revealing itself.'}
{2: 'Korolev', 3: 'Humans... must be... destroyed...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It is Korolev. After the battle with Gray Raven, it fell into the vacuum turbulence, but somehow managed to survive space.'}
{2: 'Korolev', 3: 'Destroy...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Now of all times!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: 'Before Korolev could attack again, Ayla cuts its remaining structure in half, completely annihilating it.'}
{3: 'However, she has also wasted precious time.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ayla looks at the opening to space—'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I must hurry...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Right at this time—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{3: 'A huge beam goes through the opening and hits the Punishing Heteromer directly.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory112.png'}
{3: 'The gravity room is a mess...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ayla struggles to maintain balance on the floating platform. She keeps telling herself one thing.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I mustn't stop. Otherwise, Selena would...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'One by one, she keeps leaping toward the next floating platform.'}
{3: 'Jumping, dodging, spinning, and slashing through anything in her way.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg901_5.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Step after step, Ayla finally makes it out of the space station.'}
{3: 'There are huge explosions on the low Earth orbit in the distance. But Ayla has no attention to spare—'}
{3: 'Still, she is one step too late...'}
{3: 'The door of the capsule, where Gabriel and Selena are in, has closed. The launch procedure has been initiated...'}
{3: 'Ayla runs with all her might on the outer surface of the space station.'}
{3: 'But the capsule has already taken off. No matter what she does, it only moves further away...'}
{3: "Only the heat from the capsule's exhaust flames remains, scorching Ayla's body."}
{3: 'All she can do is to silently watch the capsule as it flies toward Earth.'}
{3: 'Ayla mumbles to herself. She already knows her next step.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "There's still a chance... There must be...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Selena, wait for me...', 4: '1'}
